IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: The Garde Arts Center,non-profit professional center for the performing arts, strives to engage, educate, entertain, inspire,and enrich the region of greater New London County, by protecting, operating, and enhancing the historic Garde Theatre as a central cultural gathering place that presents top-quality performing arts, live music, film events, and fosters community arts organizations to strengthen community interaction and vitality.
IRS990.MissionDesc: The Garde Arts Center,non-profit professional center for the performing arts, strives to engage, educate, entertain, inspire,and enrich the region of greater New London County, by protecting, operating, and enhancing the historic Garde Theatre as a central cultural gathering place that presents top-quality performing arts, live music, film events, and fosters community arts organizations to strengthen community interaction and vitality.
IRS990.Desc: The Garde's programs included providing public schools with classroom space, hosting virtual streaming presentations by non-profit groups and state candidate races, premiering a movie about area youth and advocating for public support to save theaters. In support of our mission to protect the theaters, several capital projects occurred to make public spaces safer.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The Garde Arts Center, Inc. recognizes the tax benefit from uncertain tax positions when it is more-likely-than-not the position will be sustained upon examination by taxing authorities. As of July 31, 2022, the organization had no uncertain tax positions that qualify for either recognition or disclosure in the financial statements. In the normal course of business, the organizations tax filings are subject to examination by federal and state taxing authorities. The organizations tax returns for the last three years remain open for examination.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The Executive Director is married to the Development/Marketing Director. The Development/ marketing Director was hired with Board approval.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: The Board of Trustees President and the Executive Committee reviews compensation in like organizations and communities.
